text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Silence Suzuka's running style is<n>unlike any seen before...
And the more<n>we train, the more we understand it.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ahhh... She's going even faster than<n>before.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
She's running medium-distance like<n>it's a mile! Suzuka
really is amazing!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff... Ngh...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Should we take a break? Let me<n>know if I'm going too hard
on you.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Should we take a break? Let me<n>know if I'm going too hard
on you.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Thanks... But I'm fine. The fun I'm<n>having outweighs the
fatigue.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Despite the sweat dripping down herface, Silence Suzuka is stillbeaming. That positive attitude ofhers shows in her running.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her abilities are already incredible...<n>Just what sort of
running will come<n>about if we continue down this path?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
You've got a lot of talent, but it's a<n>little unrefined. If we
polish it juuust<n>right, we'll have ourselves a<n>diamond.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
You've got a lot of talent, but it's a<n>little unrefined. If we
polish it juuust<n>right, we'll have ourselves a<n>diamond.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
But if we want to reach for the clouds,<n>we need to make
sure the foundation<n>is solid.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
But if we want to reach for the clouds,<n>we need to make
sure the foundation<n>is solid.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
A solid foundation... Okay, I<n>understand. I'll take a short
break.
choice_data_list: Remember, our journey is just beginning!
Remember, our journey is just beginning!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Right!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
From this, we can determine that<n>ramp training builds
muscle in the<n>quadriceps, leading to explosive<n>power...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Haven't seen you in the library for a<n>long time. Did your
trainer tell you to<n>do some research?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
No, I'm just looking into effective<n>training methods to help
improve my<n>ability even more.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
My trainer's doing a wonderful job,<n>so it's not like I'm
worried. I just<n>don't like standing still.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Heh... Sounds like you found the<n>perfect team for you.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
And it really shows in your racing. No<n>one would even
dream of winning a<n>race running like you do.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
If it were any other racer, I'd caution<n>you against your
current style. But I<n>have a feeling you'll be able to<n>master
that otherworldly running of<n>yours.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Yes, I know I will. After all, the<n>scenery down that path is
calling me.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I'm pretty excited myself. I want to<n>see that fantastical
running of yours,<n>but I also can't wait to beat it with my<n>
own.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Hehe, I'm sure you'll have the<n>chance.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Suzuka!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Fukukitaru?! What are you wearing?!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Don't tell me... Is this your newest<n>good-luck outfit?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Not at all! I was doing some physical<n>therapy in the pool!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
That's right, you were injured during<n>training, weren't you?
Unfortunate as<n>it may be, at least it didn't happen<n>during a
race.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Agreed. When I try to imagine such a<n>scenario, I get chills...
All hail the great<n>Shiraoki for preventing such a grave<n>
situation! Thank youuu...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Wait, that's not why I'm here! I just<n>heard some dreadful
news, so I came<n>here as fast as I could!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Suzuka, is it true that your next race is<n>the Kinko Sho?!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Y-yes, that's correct...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Hnngh! To think I'd be up against a<n>soaring eagle like you
in my great<n>return to racing!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Just as I was feeling good about my<n>future, I receive this
most devastating<n>news. Don't tell me... Disaster<n>
approaches!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
You could be that disaster, Fukukitaru.<n>I saw you win the
Kikuka Sho. You<n>were amazing.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Agreed. That sprint in the homestretch<n>was magnificent.
Have some<n>confidence.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Hrrrm... Perhaps I amoverreacting. There's no telling howthis race will unfold.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Yeah, you're right! I'm a G1 titleholder! Others might count me out, butguess what? I've got what it takes towin despite my hiatus!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, I'm looking forward to it.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Ooohhh! That smile has me scared all<n>over again! I knew it,
a great<n>misfortune awaits! Shiraokiiiiii!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Oh, for—shut up and go back to the<n>pool already!

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text:
Think we'll see Silence Suzuka<n>outrun the rest of the racers
today?

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text:
Are you kidding? Have you seen this<n>lineup? No way it's
gonna be that<n>easy!

text_block_list.name: Fan C
text_block_list.text:
Well, I think she can do it! Show us<n>that amazing running of
yours,<n>Suzuka!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Inhale... exhale...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
We cranked up the intensity of your<n>training, but you took it
in stride.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Thinking about the scenery I'll see<n>after all this hard work
made any<n>fatigue I had just disappear.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Every day is such a joy. I can feel<n>myself running towards
my dreams.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I feel the same way. I wake up every<n>morning wondering
just how much<n>you'll grow today.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Then I suppose I'll have to show you<n>in today's race. I
promise that I won't<n>let anyone else take the lead.
choice_data_list:
That's right, now go find your one-of-a-kind
scenery!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I will!
